name: Production Order Quantity Variance
query:
select typ as 'IN/OUT::60', item_code as 'Item::120', item_name as 'Item Name::300', stock_uom as 'UOM::70', sum(standard_qty) as 'Standard Qty::100', sum(actual_qty) as 'Actual Qty::100' 
from (
select if(isnull(s_warehouse), 'OUT', 'IN') as typ, st.item_code, st.item_name, st.stock_uom, st.qty*st.conversion_factor as actual_qty, st.valuation_rate, 0 as standard_qty
from `tabStock Entry Detail` st 
left join `tabStock Entry` s on s.name=st.parent 
where s.docstatus=1 and purpose in ('Manufacture', 'Material Transfer for Manufacture') and production_order=%(production_order)s
union all
select 'IN' as typ, p.item_code, p.item_name, i.stock_uom, 0 as actual_qty, 0 , p.required_qty
from `tabProduction Order Item` p
left join `tabItem` i on p.item_code=i.name
where p.docstatus=1 and p.parent=%(production_order)s
union all
select 'OUT' as typ, sc.item_code, sc.item_name, sc.stock_uom, 0 as actual_qty, 0 , (sc.stock_qty/b.quantity)*po.produced_qty
from `tabBOM Scrap Item` sc
left join `tabProduction Order` po on po.bom_no=sc.parent
left join `tabBOM` b on b.name=sc.parent
where sc.docstatus=1 and po.name=%(production_order)s
union all
select 'OUT' as typ, po.production_item, i.item_name, i.stock_uom, 0 as actual_qty, 0 , po.qty*(1+b.scrap/100)
from `tabProduction Order` po
left join `tabItem` i on po.production_item=i.name
left join `tabBOM` b on b.name=po.bom_no
where po.docstatus=1 and po.name=%(production_order)s) a
group by typ, item_code
